name: The Elder Scrolls II: Daggerfall
notes:
For MIDI audio:

Method 1 (higher quality, might need to install additional packages):
I - Need to install fluid-soundfont-gm and fluidsynth. For Mint 19:
sudo apt install -y fluid-soundfont-gm fluidsynth
II - Open terminal and run the command (needs to be run each time you want to play):
fluidsynth -l -s -i -aalsa -o audio.alsa.device=default /usr/share/sounds/sf2/FluidR3_GM.sf2
III - Start the game.

Method 2 (lower quality, no additional packages):
I - Configure --> Game Options --> Main File --> Select 'dosbox_daggerfall_settings.conf'
II - Run the game and you'll start the Setup
III - Either do Autodetect or Select MIDI --> Sound Blaster Pro --> Port 338
IV - Test to make sure it works
V - OK --> OK and save configuration
VI - Configure --> Game Options --> Main File --> Select 'dosbox_daggerfall_single.conf'
VII - Start the game
content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the GOG installer
- file2: https://lutris.net/files/tools/innoextract.tar.gz
game:
  config_file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosbox_daggerfall.conf
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $file2
- execute:
    args: -d "$CACHE" "$file1"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/app
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX
    src: $GAMEDIR/dosbox_daggerfall_single.conf
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX
    src: $GAMEDIR/dosbox_daggerfall.conf
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX
    src: $GAMEDIR/dosbox_daggerfall_settings.conf
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX
    src: $GAMEDIR/dosbox_daggerfall_fixsave.conf
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosbox_daggerfall.conf
    key: aspect
    section: render
    value: true
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosbox_daggerfall.conf
    key: fullscreen
    section: sdl
    value: true
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosbox_daggerfall.conf
    key: fullresolution
    section: sdl
    value: 1920x1080
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosbox_daggerfall.conf
    key: cycles
    section: cpu
    value: max
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosbox_daggerfall.conf
    key: midiconfig
    section: midi
    value: '128:0'
main_file: DOSBOX/dosbox_daggerfall_single.conf
